item.title: Acolyte
item.description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple to a specific god or pantheon of gods. You act as an intermediary between the realm of the holy and the mortal world, performing sacred rites and offering sacrifices in order to conduct worshipers into the presence of the divine. You are not necessarily a cleric—performing sacred rites is not the same thing as channeling divine power. Choose a god, a pantheon of gods, or some other quasi-divine being, and work with your GM to detail the nature of your religious service.

item.title: Apprentice
item.description: You were apprenticed to a local craftsman. Ability Score Increase. Choose 1 of Strength Dexterity Intelligence Proficiencies. Skills. None. Tools. Choose 1 of Smith’s Tools Brewer’s Supplies

item.title: Noble
item.description: You come from aristocracy or nobility. Ability Score Increase. Choose 1 of Intelligence Wisdom Charisma Proficiencies. Skills. Choose 1 of Deception Diplomacy Intimidate Society Tools. None.

item.title: Student
item.description: You have been studying at a college or university. Ability Score Increase. Choose 1 of Intelligence Wisdom Proficiencies. Skills. Choose 1 of Arcana History Linguistics Medicine Nature Religion Science Technology Tools. None.
